```{r}
library(nycflights13)
library(dplyr)
```
```{r}
dim(flights)
head(flights)
names(flights)
```


```{r}
#operations on rows: arrange, distinct , filter

#filter flights with depature delay greater than 30 min
filter(flights, dep_delay > 30)

#select distinct rows of origin and dest
distinct(flights, origin, dest)
```



```{r}
#operations on columns: mutate, select, rename, relocate

#select columns 
select(flights, distance, arr_delay)
select(flights, !year:day)


rename(flights, new.arr.delay = arr_delay)

mutate(flights,
  gain = arr_delay - dep_delay,
  speed = distance / air_time * 60)
```
